ygData.subject: Re: Rainbow Festival - 1 PM Eastern
ygData.msgSnippet: That would be noon central time and 11 am Mountain. In Europe, I think it would be in the early evening for most places.
ygData.messageBody:
That would be noon central time and 11 am Mountain.

In Europe, I think it would be in the early evening for most places.

Jerry Luttrell wrote:

> From: "Jerry Luttrell" <tinarin@...>
>
> Stupid question, but what time is that Central?
>
> >From: David Lari <kerik@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
> >To: EQ_rainbow@onelist.com
> >Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Rainbow Festival - 1 PM Eastern
> >Date: Fri, 27 Aug 1999 08:03:44 -0400
> >
> >From: David Lari <kerik@...>
> >
> >Okay, now we have some interest in the get together. As I said in the first
> >post, we can get together and chat, have fun, whatever. After awhile, we
> >can
> >go hunting a bit if we want.
> >
> >If you don't have a character on Brell, just create one in the city of
> >Freeport (even though humans are not too pretty, hehe). If you already have
> >a
> >Brell character and need assistance getting to Freeport, let me know. Binds
> >will be provided to those who want them.
> >
> >We will try to start at 1 PM Eastern, which is 10 AM Pacific. And it is
> >hopefully early enough for our European Rainbow members to join us too.
> >
> >If you can't make it at that time, please just give me a tell anytime
> >(Dedric,
> >gnome Necro) Saturday as I will be on probably all day.
> >
> >Many of you may have concerns about the newbie areas on Brell being
> >crowded.
> >Now that the new regular server has opened, the Brell newbie areas are
> >getting
> >thinned out. I do have to admit, it was a bit of a pain for awhile though.
> >But
> >I hope those of you who left Brell for that reason will come back. I'll
> >even
> >be willing to help you power level a little if you want.
> >
> >Hope to see you all in Norrath soon.
> >
> >Hugs,
> >David
> >
> >
